channel.title: NYS:C on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NYS:C on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Citi CEO Meets Trump on Fannie, Freddie Public Offerings
item.description: Citigroup Inc. Chief Executive Officer Jane Fraser met with President Donald Trump on Wednesday to pitch public stock offerings for mortgage giants Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac.

item.title: Citi CEO Meets Trump on Fannie, Freddie Public Offerings
item.description: Citigroup Inc. Chief Executive Officer Jane Fraser met with President Donald Trump on Wednesday to pitch public stock offerings for mortgage giants Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac.

item.title: Citi Lifts Gold Short-Term Outlook on Growth Concerns
item.description: Citigroup Inc. revised its forecast for gold, with analysts now predicting bullion will rally to a record high in the near term due to a worsening US economy and inflation-boosting tariffs.

item.title: Citi Lifts Gold Short-Term Outlook on Growth Concerns
item.description: Citigroup Inc. revised its forecast for gold, with analysts now predicting bullion will rally to a record high in the near term due to a worsening US economy and inflation-boosting tariffs.

item.title: Citigroup Fixed-Income, Stock Trading Revenue Soar in 2Q
item.description: Citigroup Inc.’s traders had their best second quarter in five years with revenue buoyed by record trading volumes in the quarter. Sonali Basak reports on Bloomberg Television.
